participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Alex is practical, hardworking, and has a nurturing side, especially towards animals. She enjoys taking on challenges in her construction work.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Samantha is vibrant, social, and enjoys living life to the fullest. She is confident and takes pride in her appearance.
participant_2.background: i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i'm high maintenance. i diet a lot.

content.text: i love listening to britney spears. what is your favorite music?
i like to tan in tanning beds. do you want to get in bed with me?
i'm high maintenance when it's summer and i'm going to los angeles
